mapper.insert: insert into account (login_name, age, password, nick_name, location) values (#{loginName}, #{age}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{location})
mapper.select: select id, login_name, age, password, nick_name, location from account
mapper.update: update account set login_name = #{loginName}, age = #{age}, password = #{password}, nick_name = #{nickName}, location = #{location} where id = #{id}
